item.description:
We had hoped to have a private wine and cheese tasting meetup on this date, but since that hasn't worked out as planned, I think a more adventurous expedition is in order. Fortunately, we won't need any special mountain climbing equipment and won't have to travel any further than East Arlington. But we will get a taste of Nepali/Indian fusion cuisine that is, as far as I know, unavailable anywhere else in the greater Boston area

Let's meet at the restaurant at 6:45 for a 7 pm reservation. Please note that the $3 reservation fee is actually a pre-payment for part of your dinner; I will add it in when I figure the tax and tip for our table and show each person what they owe. You are not paying $3 just to RSVP to a meetup.

If this is your first meetup with us, please read the "About Us" section under the Files tab before you attend.
item.name: Dinner in the Himalayans, no sherpas required
